channel.title: 718 loading 742 Login Help
channel.description: Hello, I'm needing a bit of help with the login system in my 718 Server (Loading 742), I've got a small problem, when A user/me goes to login, their username has to be in all lowercase, or else it will return with invalid login, It wont let any capital letters in the username. How can I fix this? It'd be so helpful. I've never really had to deal with any login system like this before. Thanks guys.

item.title: 718 loading 742 Login Help
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

its to do with your client, your client is blocking some symbols etc. so just remove them and im not too sure which file

Read full topic

item.title: 718 loading 742 Login Help
item.dc:creator: @codyth codyth
item.description:
@codyth wrote:

Hello, I’m needing a bit of help with the login system in my 718 Server (Loading 742), I’ve got a small problem, when A user/me goes to login, their username has to be in all lowercase, or else it will return with invalid login, It wont let any capital letters in the username. How can I fix this? It’d be so helpful. I’ve never really had to deal with any login system like this before. Thanks guys.

Read full topic
